title: Ep. 32 "I Need A Ride or Die" feat. Sarah Vivan
description:
But where are we riding to? Why do we have to die? What exactly are we riding for? Am I going to jail???

This week Sarah Vivan joins Kiki & Medinah to break down what it truly means to be that ride or die chick, growing stronger, and what her exes all have in common. The ladies also share who's really willing to ride or die. The answers may surprise you.

Follow our guest Sarah Vivan @SarahVivan

You can find us at @cocktalespodcast
Kiki @KikiSaidSo
Medinah Monroe @Coffeebeandean & @Medinah_Monroe (twitter)
